import { Component,Input,Output,EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-popup', templateUrl: './popup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./popup.component.css'] }) export class PopupComponent { console.log( this.value);value:string = ''; closePop(){ this.value = '' console.log( this.value); } data:Object[]=[] addTask(taskData:{title:string, description:string,type:string}){ this.data.push(taskData) console.log(this.data); } }
